attributes.action: retain plans to exempt vehicles more than 40 yo from road worthiness tests.
attributes.additional_details:
MOT  exemption  ,  , But considering these people below are deemed better than every one else to look after their vehicles
 all Farming vehicles including huge trailers that can carry enormous weight on the roads ,  Vehicles having a base or centre in any of the following islands, namely Arran, Bute, Great Cumbrae, Islay, Mull, Tiree or North Uist from which the use of the vehicle on a journey is normally commenced.

rejection.details:
The Government has already decided that most vehicles over 40 years old (on a rolling basis) will be exempt from MOT testing from 20 May 2018. We're not sure what additional action you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You can find out more about this decision here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/consultations/roadworthiness-testing-for-vehicles-of-historic-interest
